data.title: Schools and Education in Bedfordshire
data.meta_description: Are you looking for a primary or secondary school in Bedfordshire? You must read our in-depth guide first.
data.text:
Bedfordshire Education Profile

The median school in Bedfordshire has 15% of its pupils entitled to free schools meals, the 13th lowest figure in England. This represents about 17,000 pupils, or approximately 1 in 7 of Bedfordshire's pupils. Looking at the number of pupils per teacher, the median ratio for Bedfordshire is 20.05 school children per full-time equivalent teacher. This is the 9th highest ratio in England, and the 1st highest pupil/teacher ratio in the East of England region of the UK.

The 1 schools in Bedfordshire operating with pupil referral units offer 45 PRU places to the local area. For teen mothers, there are at least 12 places available (data quality standards vary) from the single school providing places for teen mothers.

Looking at schools offering support for special educational needs, ; and .
